title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on KD/Kyrie Collapse, Harden/Simmons Trade, Tatum Superstardom
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on KD/Kyrie Collapse, Harden/Simmons Trade, Tatum Superstardom
description:
Colin explains why KD’s decision to team up with Kyrie Irving will leave a permanent mark on his legacy, why bad officiating doesn’t mean officials are rigging playoff games, how the Bucks offense is thriving without an injured Khris Middleton, and what Lincoln Riley saw about the future of Oklahoma football that made him bail for USC.

Then, First Things First co-host - and host of the What's Wright? podcast - Nick Wright joins Colin to discuss the collapse of the KD/ Kyrie partnership (19:00), what’s specifically gone wrong against the Celtics (23:00), if the Nets should pay Kyrie or let him walk (27:00), if this playoff collapse permanently stains KD’s legacy (31:00), if Nick is ready to admit Jayson Tatum is superstar (33:00), how James Harden has been the opposite of Ben Simmons since his trade to Philly (37:00), and why Colin decided to dust off his USC pom-poms for the Lincoln Riley era (48:00). 

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
